translations.text: When the earth will be shaken with a mighty shaking,<sup foot_note="182808">1</sup>
and the earth will throw up all her burdens,<sup foot_note="182809">1</sup>
and man will cry out: “What is the matter with her?”<sup foot_note="182810">1</sup>
On that Day it will relate all her news,<sup foot_note="182811">1</sup>
for your Lord will have commanded her (to do so).
On that Day people will go forth in varying states<sup foot_note="182812">1</sup> so that they be shown their deeds.<sup foot_note="182813">2</sup>
So, whoever does an atom's weight of good shall see it;
and whoever does an atom's weight of evil shall see it.<sup foot_note="182814">1</sup>
